page.title: 03LEWES ATHLETIC CLUB
page.content: Our club first started in September 1983.It is not that popular but it has had up to fifty people.There is an adults and childrens session.There is a club T_shirt and vest.In the summer it is held in the{CONVENT FIELDS}near the station.We do javelin throwing long jump and tripple jump and we do long and short distance running.In the winter it is held in the{PRIORY {MIDDLE SCHOOL GYM.}Sometimes we do indoor hockey and we use the apparatus. Ron Cosham and Peter Cornwall are in charge and Sarah Tait is secretary, but other volunteers help.Our colours are red and yellow. by Charlotte Watkinson and Louise Foreman.
